home.title: Web Agency in Horsens – Get a Website from 1,499 kr | WebHjerte
home.description: Modern website with SEO from a local web agency in Horsens – get more visibility and more customers online today.
home.keywords: web agency horsens, web agency in jylland, web design company, website for small businesses, SEO Denmark, SEO website check, modern web design, responsive design, order website, free website, website discount
home.heroSubtitle: Local Web Agency in Horsens – Professional Web Design in Jylland
home.whoAreWeText1: WebHjerte Studio was created to make modern, user-friendly web design accessible to all Danish businesses – regardless of size or budget.
home.whoAreWeText2: We started in 2024 in Horsens focusing on small and medium businesses that often lack customized and affordable web solutions.
home.whoAreWeText3: We deliver aesthetic, functional, and GDPR-compliant websites with high performance and easy maintenance.
home.whoAreWeText4: At WebHjerte, you get not only a professional website but a digital partner who helps your business grow online.
home.card1Text: We analyze your business goals and develop a tailored digital strategy – with full transparency and ongoing communication.
home.card2Text: Each design and feature is carefully crafted to match your business – both visually and technically.
home.card3Text: We prioritize efficiency and quality – with clear deadlines and fast results without stress.

services.pageDescription: We create professional websites, e-commerce solutions, and SEO optimization for small businesses in Denmark.
services.pageKeywords: web development, SEO, responsive design, e-commerce, UX/UI design, digital marketing
services.heroSubtitle: Professional web design for Danish small businesses.
services.disclaimer: Our company does not provide domain registration or hosting, but we are experts in assisting with the setup. We ensure everything runs smoothly so you can focus on your business without worries.
